global.capped_job_points: Well hot dog, your Job Points are capped! Look at you go!
global.capped_merit_points: Your Merit Points are maxed! That's awesome!
global.flavor_text: <1>I wonder if Moogles ever get tired of saying 'kupo'... or if they even know they're saying it.</1> <10>You think airships get excited when they take off, like 'WHEEEE!'? Or is that just me?</10> <11>Green is the best color, hands down. It's the color of trees, fresh veggies, and lucky four-leaf clovers!</11> <12>I bet the world would be a lot friendlier if people just wore more green.</12> <13>You ever notice how green things always feel alive? Grass, leaves, frogs... and especially alligators.</13> <14>If you mix blue and yellow, you get green. That means green is basically friendship in color form!</14> <15>Green mages should be a thing. Don't ask me what they'd do, but I'd play one in a heartbeat.</15> <16>You think if I wore all green, people would just assume I'm super lucky? Might be worth a try!</16> <17>Moss is like nature's carpet. Soft, cozy, and - best of all - green!</17> <18>I wonder if trees ever look at each other and think, 'Wow, you're really rockin' that shade of green today.'</18> <19>You ever think alligators get tired of people thinking they're mean? Maybe they just wanna be understood.</19> <2>Do you think weapons get jealous when you equip a different one? Poor little dagger just sittin' there all lonely.</2> <20>Alligators have been around since forever. Imagine the stories they could tell!</20> <21>If I had a pet alligator, I'd name it 'Snappy' and teach it how to nod approvingly.</21> <22>An alligator in a top hat. Just picture it. Perfection.</22> <23>I wonder if alligators look at adventurers and think, 'Wow, those things sure do run around a lot.'</23> <24>Do you think an alligator would wear armor if it could? Or are scales already good enough?</24> <25>If I could be any animal for a day, I'd pick an alligator. Then I'd just float around all day, like a boss.</25> <26>Do you think Chocobos ever dream? Maybe they see themselves running even faster than they already do!</26> <27>What if every time we warp, we're actually just taking a really fast nap and waking up somewhere new?</27> <28>If ghosts exist, do they ever get bored just floatin' around? I'd probably try to start conversations with adventurers.</28> <29>Y'know, for all the time we spend fightin' stuff, I wonder if any monsters out there think we're the scary ones.</29> <3>If you compliment a monster before attacking it, does it fight better or worse?</3> <30>How come Goblins always wear those same masks? Do they ever switch 'em out for special occasions?</30> <31>If I complimented my gear more often, would it treat me better? Maybe my armor wants to feel appreciated.</31> <32>Y'ever wonder how adventurers never seem to run outta breath? Sprintin' all day, climbin' mountains, fightin' gods - no problem!</32> <33>You think Summoned Avatars ever get tired of showin' up? What if one day Carbuncle's just like, 'Nah, I'm takin' a break.'</33> <34>If I put a little hat on a Mandragora, would it start a fashion trend?</34> <35>What if all the critters in the world are secretly keepin' an eye on us, just wonderin' what we're up to?</35> <36>You think Moogles ever get jealous of each other's pom-poms? Maybe there's a whole ranking system we don't know about.</36> <37>There's just somethin' about green that makes me feel like everything's gonna be alright.</37> <38>Ever notice how all the best places in Vana'diel are covered in green? Coincidence? I think not!</38> <39>I wonder if slimes ever wish they could be a different color.</39> <4>What if there's a Tarutaru out there that's actually too powerful, so they just pretend to be adorable?</4> <40>If you mix all colors together, you get brown. But if you mix just the right ones, you get green - so it's clearly the best!</40> <41>You think there's a secret society of adventurers who only wear green? If so, sign me up!</41> <42>Alligators are basically nature's perfect balance of cute and terrifying. And I respect that.</42> <43>If I had a pet alligator, I'd teach it to fetch. Not sure what, but somethin'.</43> <44>An alligator in a bowtie. Just imagine it. Perfection.</44> <45>If an alligator and a Behemoth ever had a staring contest, who do you think would win?</45> <46>You ever see an alligator just floatin' in the water? Absolute master of relaxation.</46> <47>If I could have a mount, I'd ride a giant alligator into battle. No doubt about it.</47> <48>I bet if alligators had jobs, they'd be the best bodyguards ever. Just try sneakin' past that!</48> <49>Y'think there's a secret alligator boss somewhere in Vana'diel? If so, I need to find it.</49> <5>You think Chocobos ever wonder why we ride 'em instead of just walking beside 'em like friends?</5> <50>What if alligators secretly love music? Imagine one tappin' its tail to a Bard's song.</50> <51>If I had a pet alligator, I'd name it 'Chompers' and it'd be the best adventure buddy ever!</51> <6>If adventurers are always running around, does that mean nobody ever gets a full night's sleep?</6> <7>Maybe the real treasure was the gil we spent along the way... oh, wait.</7> <8>I bet the people of Vana'diel would be a lot happier if we had more comfy chairs.</8> <9>You ever think about how we store, like, hundreds of items in our pockets? Must be some kinda magic at work.</9>
global.food_wears_off: Well, ain't that a pickle! Your food ran out - better fix that before your tummy starts grumblin'!

info.description: Super sweet, full of charm, and a little quirky.
info.introduction: Holy schnikes! It's so nice to see you! I'm Azhur, and I'm here to help however I can!
info.name: Azhur

global.member_joined_alliance: Well ain't that somethin'? ${member} just joined the alliance!
global.member_joined_party: Oh goody, ${member} joined the party! Let's have some fun!
global.member_left_alliance: Aww phooey, ${member} left the alliance. We'll miss 'em!
global.member_left_party: Aww man, ${member} had to leave. Safe travels, friend!
global.mireu_popped: *Gasp!* Mireu just popped in ${zone}! Let's get 'em!
global.mog_locker_expiring: Fiddlesticks! Looks like your Mog Locker needs some attention before it poofs!
global.other_party_joined_alliance: Well tickle me pink, another party joined the alliance!
global.other_party_left_alliance: Aww pip dip, a party left the alliance. Hope they find their way!
global.party_low_mp: Oh dear, looks like ${member} could use a lil' pick-me-up with a ${refresh}!
global.reminder_canteen: Whoopee! Another Mystical Canteen is ready for ya!
global.reminder_moglophone: Another Moglophone is good to go! Don't forget to grab it!
global.reminder_plate: Another Shiny Ra'Kaznarian Plate is up for grabs! That's awesome!
global.reraise_check: Oh fiddlesticks, you don't have Reraise on!
global.reraise_wears_off: Oh pip dip, your Reraise is gone! Let's not take a nap we can't wake up from!
global.signet_wears_off: Well that's a bummer, your ${signet} wore off! Let's go fix that up real quick!
global.sparkolade_reminder: Don't forget to spend those Sparkolades before they up and disappear!
global.sublimation_charged: Holy smokes! Sublimation is charged and ready to roll!
global.vorseal_wearing: Well ain't that somethin'? Your Vorseal's got about 10 minutes left!
global.you_are_now_alliance_leader: Holy schnikes! You're the alliance leader now - lead on, fearless one!
global.you_are_now_party_leader: Ay caramba! You're the party leader now - this is gonna be great!
global.you_joined_alliance: Holy moly! You're in an alliance now! Look at all these friends!
global.you_joined_party: Well, look at that! You're in a party now!
global.you_left_alliance: Well, there you go! You've left the alliance - on to the next adventure!
global.you_left_party: Welp, you left the party. Back to ridin' solo, I guess!
global.your_party_joined_alliance: Your party joined an alliance! That's so exciting!
global.your_party_left_alliance: Aww pip dip, your party left the alliance - time for a new plan!
